title: Railroad Revenue Passenger-Miles, Other Than Commutation, Class I Railroads for United States
notes:
Data Were Computed By Subtracting Commutation Passengers From Total Passengers. Preliminary Data Were Used Beginning April 1947. Source: Interstate Commerce Commission, Revenue Traffic Statistics Of Class I Steam Railways.

This NBER data series m03012d appears on the NBER website in Chapter 3 at http://www.nber.org/databases/macrohistory/contents/chapter03.html.

NBER Indicator: m03012d
